tasks.label: git: commit-and-push
tasks.command: git add -A && git commit -m "Add debug profile endpoint and server routing" || echo 'no changes to commit' && git push origin main

tasks.label: git: commit-access-token-push
tasks.command: git add -A && git commit -m "access token fetch" || echo 'no changes to commit' && git push origin main

tasks.label: git: commit-and-push-ps
tasks.command: git add -A; if ((git status --porcelain) -ne '') { git commit -m "Add logging for create profile errors" } else { echo "no changes to commit" }; git push origin main
